item.title: Apple Music - The Official Rihanna Interview
item.description: 14 number one songs. 14 number one songs. She has 9 Grammys. She’s Oscar nominated, an entrepreneur, a visionary, and this Sunday at the Apple Music Super Bowl LVII Halftime Show, the wait is over! It’s been 2,190 days. Dude. Rihanna, we waited for you. You it’s been over six years since the nine-time Grammy winner – Rihanna. RiRi, where have you been? We have been impatiently waiting for –
